definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: The general anesthesia therapy dose are few, regains consciousness thoroughly, rapid, the controllability is good.
sentences.chinese: 全麻药用量少，苏醒彻底，迅速，可控性好。

sentences.english: Are you feeling a pain when I use the drill? Then I will use an injection for anesthesia?
sentences.chinese: 当我钻牙时有感觉痛吗？如果有，我将给您打针麻药。

sentences.english: Stretching can help local anesthetic it?
I'II give her a shot of anaesthetic first.
sentences.chinese: 首先我要给她打一针麻药。

sentences.english: Are there relative or absolute contraindications to the administration of a general anesthetic in the ambulatory setting?
sentences.chinese: 有没有门诊手术给全麻药的相对或绝对禁忌证？

sentences.english: The addition of epinephrine to local anesthetic solutions produces vasoconstriction.
sentences.chinese: 局麻药溶液中加入肾上腺素，使血管收缩。

sentences.english: The decay is very deep, so I will use a local anesthetic before drilling.
sentences.chinese: 龋洞很深，在钻牙前我将给您打一针麻药。

sentences.english: It is a cup of drugged coffee.
sentences.chinese: 那是一杯下了麻药的咖啡。

sentences.english: Criminal organizations are competing for control of drug trafficking into the United States.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪组织正在为把麻药输往美国的控制权而顽固拼命。

sentences.english: There were no serious side reactions such as total spinal anesthesia and local anesthetic intoxication.
sentences.chinese: 两组均未出现全脊麻及局麻药中毒等严重不良反应。

sentences.english: In those days, dentistry was basic. Extractions were carried out without anaesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，牙科学刚起步，拔牙都不打麻药。

sentences.english: When he came out from under the anesthetic, the doctor was leaning over him anxiously.
sentences.chinese: 当麻药渐渐失效时，医生焦虑地弯身看着他。

sentences.english: The anesthetist gave me an anesthetic.
Whether used anesthetic, the winter Yan cared nothing about.
sentences.chinese: 是否用了麻药，冬彦毫不在乎。

sentences.english: We found that effects of bupivacaine was better than other local anesthetics in cervical plexus block.
sentences.chinese: 在颈丛阻滞时，丁吡卡因的阻滞效果优于其它局麻药。

definition: general anesthetic/abbr. for 全身麻醉
to give or have an injection
